put.summary: Create a rendition for a clip
put.description:
Required Permissions: EditClipRendition Developer Information: The request must contain valid size and purpose. IMPORTANT:The valid size are: full, xlarge, large, medium, small. The valid purpose are: comp, preview, thumbnail, housemaster. Example: {
"purpose": "preview",
"size": "medium",
"variant": "xyz"
}

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Clip Id

200.description: rendition was created successfully

put.x-developerInformation: The request must contain valid size and purpose. IMPORTANT:The valid size are: full, xlarge, large, medium, small. The valid purpose are: comp, preview, thumbnail, housemaster.

delete.summary: Delete a rendition for a clip
delete.description:
Required Permissions: DeleteClipRendition Developer Information: The request delete the rendition from the rendition table in the database and/or delete the rendition file from S3 bucket. Example: deleteFile is false then delete the rendition from the rendition table in the database only,
keep the rendition file.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Clip Id

parameters.name: renditionId
parameters.description: Rendition Id

parameters.name: deleteFile
parameters.description: Delete the rendition file from the S4 bucket.

200.description: The rendition was deleted successfully

404.description: No clip or rendition were found

delete.x-developerInformation: The request delete the rendition from the rendition table in the database and/or delete the rendition file from S3 bucket.
delete.x-example: deleteFile is false then delete the rendition from the rendition table in the database only, keep the rendition file.

post.summary: Create a rendition for a clip
post.description:
Required Permissions: CreateClipRendition Developer Information: The request must contain valid size, purpose and uri. IMPORTANT:The valid size are: full, xlarge, large, medium, small. The valid purpose are: comp, preview, thumbnail, housemaster. The uri cannot be null. Example: {
"purpose": "preview",
"size": "medium",
"variant": "xyz",
"uri": "uri"
}

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Clip Id

200.description: rendition was created successfully

post.x-developerInformation: The request must contain valid size, purpose and uri. IMPORTANT:The valid size are: full, xlarge, large, medium, small. The valid purpose are: comp, preview, thumbnail, housemaster. The uri cannot be null.

get.summary: Asset search.
get.description:
Required Permissions: There are no required permissions for this endpoint. Developer Information:
  • All filter ids are dependent on what site the search is being performed on.
  • If left blank, the default value for sortId is 0.
  • filterIds and filterValues are OPTIONAL fields. However, if you list one or more filterIds AND the filterId requires a value they must be accompanied by the appropriatevalues in the filterValues field.
  • Filter Example 1: (Warning: filterId numbers will vary based on your site.) If you enter '1517' as a filterId, the filterValue field should include the filterId and a date or date range ('1517:11/28/2016 - 11/29/2016'). In this case, if no timestamp is included, the results will include all clips from that date, regardless of time.To include a timestamp, use the following format: '1998-03-04 23:59:59'.
  • Filter Example 2: (Warning: filterId numbers will vary based on your site.) To use multiple filterIds use a comma-separated list for both filterIds and filterValues. If you enter '123,456,789' into the filterId field,you should enter '123:1080i,456:archive,789:"Rights Managed"' into the filterValue field.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Query string. If left blank, it will return all clips.

parameters.name: sortId
parameters.description: Sort id. If left blank, it will sort based on the configured default.

parameters.name: i
parameters.description: Page index number. Initial page is 0.

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: Number of results per page. The maximum number is 200.

parameters.name: filterIds
parameters.description: Comma separated list of filter ids to be applied to the query, regardless of whether those filters require values.

parameters.name: filterValues
parameters.description: Comma separated pairs of filter ids and filter values. To be used when a filter id requires a value. Format is filterId:value, filterId:value.

parameters.name: gq
parameters.description: Gallery query string.

parameters.name: afn
parameters.description: Asset Fields Name config string.

200.description: Clips were found and returned

400.description: No Assets were found due to bad request

get.x-developerInformation:
• All filter ids are dependent on what site the search is being performed on.
  • If left blank, the default value for sortId is 0.
  • filterIds and filterValues are OPTIONAL fields. However, if you list one or more filterIds AND the filterId requires a value they must be accompanied by the appropriatevalues in the filterValues field.
  • Filter Example 1: (Warning: filterId numbers will vary based on your site.) If you enter '1517' as a filterId, the filterValue field should include the filterId and a date or date range ('1517:11/28/2016 - 11/29/2016'). In this case, if no timestamp is included, the results will include all clips from that date, regardless of time.To include a timestamp, use the following format: '1998-03-04 23:59:59'.
  • Filter Example 2: (Warning: filterId numbers will vary based on your site.) To use multiple filterIds use a comma-separated list for both filterIds and filterValues. If you enter '123,456,789' into the filterId field,you should enter '123:1080i,456:archive,789:"Rights Managed"' into the filterValue field.

get.summary: Asset search.
get.description:
Required Permissions: There are no required permissions for this endpoint. Developer Information:
  • All filter ids are dependent on what site the search is being performed on.
  • If left blank, the default value for sortId is 0.
  • filterIds and filterValues are OPTIONAL fields. However, if you list one or more filterIds AND the filterId requires a value they must be accompanied by the appropriatevalues in the filterValues field.
  • Filter Example 1: (Warning: filterId numbers will vary based on your site.) If you enter '1517' as a filterId, the filterValue field should include the filterId and a date or date range ('1517:11/28/2016 - 11/29/2016'). In this case, if no timestamp is included, the results will include all clips from that date, regardless of time.To include a timestamp, use the following format: '1998-03-04 23:59:59'.
  • Filter Example 2: (Warning: filterId numbers will vary based on your site.) To use multiple filterIds use a comma-separated list for both filterIds and filterValues. If you enter '123,456,789' into the filterId field,you should enter '123:1080i,456:archive,789:"Rights Managed"' into the filterValue field.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Query string. If left blank, it will return all clips.

parameters.name: sortId
parameters.description: Sort id. If left blank, it will sort based on the configured default.

parameters.name: i
parameters.description: Page index number. Initial page is 0.

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: Number of results per page. The maximum number is 200.

parameters.name: filterIds
parameters.description: Comma separated list of filter ids to be applied to the query, regardless of whether those filters require values.

parameters.name: filterValues
parameters.description: Comma separated pairs of filter ids and filter values. To be used when a filter id requires a value. Format is filterId:value, filterId:value.

parameters.name: gq
parameters.description: Gallery query string.

parameters.name: afn
parameters.description: Asset Fields Name config string.

200.description: Clips were found and returned

400.description: No Assets were found due to bad request

get.x-developerInformation:
• All filter ids are dependent on what site the search is being performed on.
  • If left blank, the default value for sortId is 0.
  • filterIds and filterValues are OPTIONAL fields. However, if you list one or more filterIds AND the filterId requires a value they must be accompanied by the appropriatevalues in the filterValues field.
  • Filter Example 1: (Warning: filterId numbers will vary based on your site.) If you enter '1517' as a filterId, the filterValue field should include the filterId and a date or date range ('1517:11/28/2016 - 11/29/2016'). In this case, if no timestamp is included, the results will include all clips from that date, regardless of time.To include a timestamp, use the following format: '1998-03-04 23:59:59'.
  • Filter Example 2: (Warning: filterId numbers will vary based on your site.) To use multiple filterIds use a comma-separated list for both filterIds and filterValues. If you enter '123,456,789' into the filterId field,you should enter '123:1080i,456:archive,789:"Rights Managed"' into the filterValue field.

get.summary: Get the list of the aiware terms with document count that match the prefix text.
get.description: Required Permissions: There are no required permissions for this endpoint. Developer Information: There is no developer information provided for this endpoint.

parameters.name: siteName
parameters.description: Site where assets are located

parameters.name: cognitionType
parameters.description: Cognition type to retrieve terms for

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The prefix text to retrieve matched search terms for

parameters.name: maxTerms
parameters.description: Maximum number of terms to retrieve

parameters.name: prefix
parameters.description: True means search terms that start with text. False means terms that contains this text within it.

200.description: successful operation

get.summary: Anonymous asset search.
get.description: Required Permissions: There are no required permissions for this endpoint. Developer Information: There is no developer information provided for this endpoint.

parameters.name: siteName
parameters.description: Site where assets are located

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Keyword in an asset's name (ex:lighthouses)

parameters.name: sortId
parameters.description: Sort id

parameters.name: i
parameters.description: Page index

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: Number of results per page

parameters.name: filterIds
parameters.description: Optional comma separated list of filter Ids

parameters.name: filterValues
parameters.description: Optional comma separated list of filter values. The filter value must follow the format: filterId:value text. For example: 12345:02/03/2016

parameters.name: gq
parameters.description: Optional. Gallery query. If included, search will run a galleryQuery search. Otherwise a normal search will proceed.

parameters.name: afn
parameters.description: Optional. Asset Fields Name config string.

200.description: successful operation
